## Variables


* Integer

```{r echo=TRUE}
x <- 10
x
```

* Character / String

```{r echo=TRUE}
x <- "test"
x
```

* Logic (`TRUE` / `FALSE`)

```{r echo=TRUE}
x <- TRUE
x
```

****

### Vector

```{r echo=TRUE}
x <- c(1,2,3,4)
x
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
x <- c(1:10)
x
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
x <- c("a", "b", "c", "d")
x
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
x <- c(1, "b", 3, "d", 5)
x
```

* fourth

```{r echo=TRUE}
x[4]
```

****

### Function

```{r echo=TRUE}
f <- function(x){
  return(x^2)
}

f(15)
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
f <- function(x,y){
  return(x^2+y^2)
}

f(1,4)
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
f <- function(x,y){
  (x-7*y)^2/3
}

f(1,4)
```

****

### Matrix

```{r echo=TRUE}
M1 <- matrix(c(1,2,1,
               0,2,7),
             ncol = 3,nrow = 2,byrow = T)
M1
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
M1[1,]
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
M1[2,3]
```

* transpose

```{r echo=TRUE}
t(M1)
```

****

### Data Frame

```{r echo=TRUE}
df <- data.frame(Name = c("Sam", "Yuji", "Lan", "Elaine"),
                 Age = c(28,24,NA,NA),
                 Height = c(177, 187, 159, 164),
                 Gender = factor(c("M", "M", "F", "F")))
df
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
df$Name
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
df$Name[3]
```

****

### List

```{r echo=TRUE}
List1 <- list(integer1 = 10,
              character1 = "ten",
              vector1 = c(1:10))

List1
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
List1$integer1
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
List1[[3]]
```
